bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of dizziness experienced by females with extreme feelings of xuan yun 眩 運 , vertigo, and a perception of heaven and earth revolving. Fu ren da quan liang Gynecological book. Southern Song fang era, 1237. 婦人大全良方 4: 治女 人頭旋，即天動地轉，名曰心眩 , “To cure females with their head revolving, that is, as if heaven and earth were moving around them. This is called ‘ heart dizziness ’”.
